verses.name: 1 Samuel 15:32
verses.text: Then said Samuel, Bring ye hither to me Agag the king of the Amalekites. And Agag came unto him delicately. And Agag said, Surely the bitterness of death is past.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 15:33
verses.text: And Samuel said, As thy sword hath made women childless, so shall thy mother be childless among women. And Samuel hewed Agag in pieces before the Lord in Gilgal.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 15:34
verses.text: Then Samuel went to Ramah; and Saul went up to his house to Gibeah of Saul.
